metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11984 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Apache HTTP server 2.4.32 to 2.4.44 mod_proxy_uwsgi info disclosure and possible RCE

notes.Note: seth-arnold> libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi binary package is in universe mdeslaur> the libapache2-mod-proxy-uwsgi module moved from the uwsgi source package to the apache2 source package in focal+

criterions.comment: uwsgi: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
